document.full_text: novak djokovic is in such formidable form he could afford to wear an all-black outfit on a boiling hot day and still breeze into the french open third round on wednesday.
document.title: djokovic goes back to black for easy win at french open
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic is in such formidable form he could afford to wear an all-black outfit on a boiling hot day and still breeze into the french open third round on wednesday.
